title: My Love Story Is Doomed to Failure Because of My Five Sisters - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Ecchi   Harem   Romance   School Life   Shounen
tags: Absent Parents   Adapted to Manhua   Average-looking Protagonist   Brother Complex   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Secret Crush   Tsundere
author: Ya Ming   啞鳴
description: Bryce Lee and his best bud Perseus Wang made a bet in order to help each other not become loners forever. After getting to know Jessie Hsu from art class, his five sisters do everything they can to stop their brother from getting a girlfriend. In the process, Bryce has to use all his wits and brain, creating many hilarious and fun scenarios. This is the story of a typical highschooler, fighting to get a girlfriend, yet getting obstructed by his five sisters.>
